newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore bunker quotes stable, talks thin.
newsitem.headline: Singapore bunker quotes stable, talks thin.

text.p: Singapore bunker quotes were steady on Friday but talks were thin and traders did not expect active enquiries later in the day.
Despite overnight crude gains, some independents still lowered their offers to get business, traders said. "Some are even offering as low as $95 for the 380-cst," one trader said.
The 380-cst grade was quoted by most majors at around $99 per tonne and the 180-cst grade was at $105. MDO and gas oil were at about $200 and $215 respectively.
